result.reason: Issue lacks reproduction steps and it's unclear whether the right shift key fails within mRemoteNG's own RDP/VNC rendering or only when the host machine is accessed via Chrome Remote Desktop (i.e., an external tool layered on top), which would be outside mRemoteNG's scope.
result.approach: Clarify if the bug is (a) mRemoteNG not forwarding VK_RSHIFT (0xA1) to an RDP/VNC session it hosts, or (b) Chrome Remote Desktop not forwarding it to mRemoteNG's window — if (a), audit WndProc/KeyDown handling to ensure right-modifier scan codes are sent; if (b), wontfix as it is a Chrome Remote Desktop limitation
